description: This file defines API routes for managing patient data in a healthcare management system. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting patient profiles, with role-based access control.

classes.name: PatientPublic
classes.description: Model representing the public view of a patient profile, used as response model.

methods.name: list_patients( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search by name"), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin, Role.doctor)), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list patients, with optional search query; restricted to admin and doctor roles.

methods.name: get_my_patient_profile(user: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.patient)))
methods.description: Retrieves the profile of the current user if they have the patient role.

methods.name: get_patient(patient_id: str, _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin, Role.doctor)))
methods.description: Fetches a patient's profile by ID; accessible by admin and doctor roles.

methods.name: create_patient(payload: PatientCreate, _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin)))
methods.description: Creates a new patient profile; restricted to admin role.

methods.name: update_patient( patient_id: str, payload: PatientUpdate, _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin, Role.doctor)) )
methods.description: Updates an existing patient profile; accessible by admin and doctor roles.

methods.name: delete_patient(patient_id: str, _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin)))
methods.description: Deletes a patient profile by ID; restricted to admin role.

ctags.name: get_patient
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_patient(patient_id: str, _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin, Role.doct/

ctags.name: list_patients
ctags.signature: ( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search by name"), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin, Role.doctor)), )

ctags.name: update_patient
ctags.signature: ( patient_id: str, payload: PatientUpdate, _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin, Role.doctor)) )
